: : Skulletron : :

Skulletron was losing time.  He had to act fast and act=
 now.  He finally made his spontaneous move.

Skulletron:  I am here to spi=
t in the face of Hydras, and offer my allegiance to the brotherhood.

He ha=
s his gun aimed at the nWo side, but slowly spins around, aiming at Wolfens=
tein and Pheonix.  He takes a step back.

Skulletron:  Come on Wolf, join m=
e!  You know it as well as I do, this is inevitable!  Can't you see that Hy=
dras has smeered the Predacon legacy and is just using us as pawns?  Megatr=
on was the last true Predacon leader!...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
From: Richard Allen 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, Janua=
ry 29, 2003 4:06 PM
  Subject: Re: nWo base


  : : Wolfenstein : : 

  Wol=
f moves up besides Skulletron, trying to figure out what he is doing. 

  :=
 : Razor : : 

  Razor: Speak quickly Predacon, you are testing the brother=
hood's patients. 

  The preceding has been paid for by the 

  New World O=
rder 

   LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote: 

    : : Skulletron :=
 :

    Skulletron's getting ready to resort to drastic measures.  He doesn=
't even quite know what he is going to do, either.  But one thing he does k=
now, is that whatever he decides to do, it is going to be big.

    Skullet=
ron:  Look boys, I didn't come here to start a fight.  I admit, I am a bit =
headstrong when it comes to facing up to enemies, but I came with secret in=
tentions, my own agenda.

    Skulletron struggles with words and thoughts.=
  He has to come up with something fast, and won't have time to think about=
 the effects...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Richard All=
en 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Tuesday, January 28, 2003=
 3:58 PM
      Subject: Re: nWo base


      : : Wolfenstein : : 

      He=
 looks at Skulletron, not knowing what he had planned for sure. 

      : :=
 Razor : : 

      Razor steps forward a bit from the rest of the nWo. 

  =
    Razor: I am the leader here. What do you have to say? 

      The prece=
ding has been paid for by the 

      New World Order 

       LurkerAbyss =
<1641coburn@...> wrote: 

        OOC:  Sorry for holding things up,=
 I've been really, really lazy in the last several weeks.  I'm back on task=
 now, though!

        : : Skulletron : :

        Skulletron stands still,=
 staring into the distance blankly for a moment.  He then snaps back to rea=
lity, ope, there goes gravity.

        Skulletron:  Wait!  I have a bargai=
n!

        He shouts out loudly.  He stops and holds his hand out to the n=
Wo defenders, gesturing to hold on for a second.

        Skulletron:  Plea=
se, get your leader, I can assure you that I won't waste your time!
